contents.content: UNIT 05 常用求职信函 Common Application Letters
杰克被告知没有通过面试，但是他仍打算给应聘单位写封感谢信。

contents.title: 玛丽：杰克，你看起来闷闷不乐的，怎么了？
contents.answer: Mary: Jack, you look blue. What's wrong?

contents.title: 杰克：我收到了一家公司的邮件，说我面试失败了。
contents.answer: Jack: I received an e-mail from a company saying that I failed the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：别担心，你以后还会有机会的。
contents.answer: Mary: Don't worry. You will have other chances in the future.

contents.title: 杰克：虽然失败了，可我还是打算写一封感谢信。我认为这样做很有必要。
contents.answer: Jack: Though I failed, I also plan to write an appreciation letter and I think it's very necessary.

contents.content: 写感谢信应注意的事项
面试之后，不管结果如何，都要及时给面试单位写封感谢信，这是求职中很必要的环节。因为写感谢信的同时，等于把握了主动权，有可能会反败为胜。

contents.title: 玛丽：我赞成，那你知道怎么写感谢信吗？
contents.answer: Mary: I agree. Do you know how to write an appreciation letter?

contents.title: 杰克：首先，我会感谢公司给我面试的机会，尽管我没有通过。
contents.answer: Jack: First I will thank them for giving me the interview, though I failed.

contents.title: 玛丽：之后你可以说一些公司的情况，特别是令你印象深刻的事情。
contents.answer: Mary: Then you can say something about the company, especially that leaves you a deep impression.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，好主意。我会那样做的。之后我会告诉公司，尽管我没有被雇用，我确实很想进入公司工作。
contents.answer: Jack: Yes, that's a good idea. I will do that. Then I will tell the company that I really want to enter their company to work although I haven't been hired.

contents.content: 面试过后的感谢信实际上可以让你再次跟面试官进行交流，又一次给了自己一个展现优点的机会。你可以用另一种形式展示自己的技能和成就，并可以再次表达自己对应聘职位的兴趣，以及自己对工作的热情。

contents.title: 玛丽：或许公司读了你的信之后会雇用你呢。
contents.answer: Mary: Maybe the company will hire you after reading your letter.

contents.title: 杰克：但愿如此吧。
contents.answer: Jack: I hope so.

contents.title: 玛丽：我认为你要写得简短点，再次强调你的优势和你对工作的热情。
contents.answer: Mary: I think you should write it briefly, and you should lay emphasis on your strengths and your enthusiasm again.

contents.title: 杰克：我想我现在应该去做了，非常感谢你。
contents.answer: Jack: I think I should do it now. Thank you very much.

contents.content: 你也可以就面试过程中令你印象深刻的一段话或者一个具体的小细节进行回顾，强调你跟面试官在某一工作问题上有相似的观点，这些或许都会为你在求职中加分的。有时也可以就面试官正在面对的问题提出你的意见和解决方案，或许会被面试官采纳，这也不失为一个好的方法。不管结果如何，我们只要尽力去做了，总会有收获的。

contents.title: 1.真的很感激昨天的面试。
contents.answer: I really appreciate the interview yesterday.

contents.title: 2.我强烈地感到我具备做那份工作的资格。
contents.answer: I feel strongly that I possess the qualities to do that job.

contents.title: 3.那天我们之间关于公司未来的讨论让我感到受益良多。
contents.answer: I really enjoyed our discussion about the future of the fi rm that day.

contents.title: 4.我深信我已经为那份工作做好了充分的准备。
contents.answer: I believe that I have prepared very well for the job.

contents.title: 5.真的很感谢你考虑了我。
contents.answer: I really thank you for having considered me.

contents.title: 6.我真的很期待我们下次的互动。
contents.answer: I am looking forward to our next interaction.

contents.title: 7.我确信贵公司将会是我发挥才能的好地方。
contents.answer: I believe that your company will be a terrifi c place for my skills.

contents.title: 8.我写这封信是为了感谢你昨天对我的面试。
contents.answer: I am writing to thank you for interviewing me yesterday.

contents.title: 9.你昨天的谈话给了我很深的印象。
contents.answer: Your discussion yesterday gave me a deep impression.

contents.title: 10.跟你谈话我感到很高兴。
contents.answer: It was a pleasure talking with you.
